abstract: HSBC Private Equity Asia, a subsidiary of HSBC‘s Asian Ventures Fund, said on Monday it had pumped $7.5 million into New Delhi, India-based Newgen Software Technologies, a company that focuses on document imaging and work flow management systems.
lead_paragraph: HSBC Private Equity Asia, a subsidiary of HSBC‘s Asian Ventures Fund, said on Monday it had pumped $7.5 million into New Delhi, India-based Newgen Software Technologies, a company that focuses on document imaging and work flow management systems.

headline.main: HSBC Pours $7.5 Million into India’s Newgen Software
